search_parameters.q: Katy Perry, age, music related skills + abilities + occupations, proficiency in each, and current residence location (city, state)

text_blocks.snippet: Katy Perry is 41 years old (born October 25, 1984). She is a globally recognized pop star known for her theatrical style and record-breaking hits.

table: High Proficiency. She possesses a vocal range of approximately three octaves (E3 to D6) and is known for powerhouse pop vocals and anthemic choruses.
High Proficiency. She has co-written the majority of her hits, including "I Kissed a Girl" and "Firework". Her writing focuses on storytelling, empowerment, and humor.
Moderate Proficiency. She has played acoustic and electric guitar since age 13, often performing unplugged sessions with her guitar.
Experienced. Served as a judge on American Idol for seven seasons (2018–2024), where she mentored aspiring artists.
Active. She founded her own record label, Unsub Records (formerly Metamorphosis Music), and launched a successful shoe line, Katy Perry Collections.
Occasional. Voiced Smurfette in The Smurfs films and has made various cameos in television and film.

text_blocks.snippet: Katy Perry currently resides in Montecito, California (Santa Barbara County).

list.snippet: Her primary residence is a $14.2 million oceanview estate purchased in 2020.
Following a lengthy legal battle, she also recently finalized the acquisition of a second $15 million compound in the same area in late 2025.

text_blocks.snippet: If you'd like, I can provide more details on her business ventures or a full list of her chart-topping singles to see how her music has evolved over time.
